statements: SELECT * FROM music_therapy_group_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, therapy_date FROM music_therapy_group_sessions WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT therapy_time, attendance_status FROM music_therapy_group_sessions WHERE therapy_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY therapy_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_therapy_group_sessions WHERE patient_id = 5 AND attendance_status = 'Absent';
SELECT session_id, therapy_date, therapy_time FROM music_therapy_group_sessions ORDER BY therapy_date ASC, therapy_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_therapy_group_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, patient_id, therapy_date FROM music_therapy_group_sessions WHERE therapy_time > '10:00:00';
SELECT AVG(session_id) AS average_session_id FROM music_therapy_group_sessions WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT patient_id, therapy_time FROM music_therapy_group_sessions ORDER BY therapy_date DESC, therapy_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sessions, MAX(therapy_date) AS latest_therapy_date FROM music_therapy_group_sessions WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM patient_attendance WHERE attended = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, attendance_date, attended FROM patient_attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapy_type FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, session_date, session_time FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, session_id FROM patient_attendance LEFT JOIN therapy_sessions ON patient_attendance.session_id = therapy_sessions.session_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_attendance WHERE attended = TRUE ORDER BY attendance_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, session_id, attendance_date FROM patient_attendance WHERE session_id = 2
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY session_time ASC
SELECT therapist_name, therapy_type FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-08-15'
SELECT DISTINCT session_id, therapist_name FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_time < '12:00:00'
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT session_id, session_date FROM TherapySessions;
SELECT session_location, total_attendees FROM TherapySessions WHERE total_attendees > 10;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_age DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, TherapySessions.session_date FROM Patients JOIN Attendance ON Patients.patient_id = Attendance.patient_id JOIN TherapySessions ON Attendance.session_id = TherapySessions.session_id WHERE session_location = 'Room A';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) AS total_sessions, AVG(total_attendees) AS avg_attendees FROM TherapySessions WHERE total_attendees > 10 GROUP BY session_location;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, TherapySessions.session_date FROM Patients JOIN Attendance ON Patients.patient_id = Attendance.patient_id JOIN TherapySessions ON Attendance.session_id = TherapySessions.session_id WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' ORDER BY TherapySessions.session_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT session_date, session_time FROM GroupSessions ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT therapist_id, therapy_type, room_number FROM TherapySessions WHERE room_number > 10;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';

SELECT patient_name, gender, session_date, session_time FROM Patients JOIN PatientSessions ON Patients.patient_id = PatientSessions.patient_id JOIN GroupSessions ON PatientSessions.session_id = GroupSessions.session_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, GroupSessions.session_date, TherapySessions.therapy_type FROM Patients JOIN PatientSessions ON Patients.patient_id = PatientSessions.patient_id JOIN GroupSessions ON PatientSessions.session_id = GroupSessions.session_id JOIN TherapySessions ON GroupSessions.session_id = TherapySessions.session_id;
SELECT therapist_id, COUNT(session_id) AS total_sessions FROM TherapySessions GROUP BY therapist_id ORDER BY total_sessions DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patients;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization FROM music_therapists ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT patient_id, session_date, therapy_type FROM sessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01' AND session_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC
SELECT therapist_name, specialization, experience_years FROM music_therapists WHERE experience_years >= 5
SELECT patient_name, age, medical_condition FROM patients WHERE age < 30 AND medical_condition IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE therapy_type='Music' AND session_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT therapist_name, feedback_text FROM feedback JOIN music_therapists ON feedback.therapist_id = music_therapists.therapist_id
